name: TQ Nation - White Theme
description: I really like what TransQueerNation.com does for the community. At the same time, I'm not the biggest fan of dark themes. The primary change is making the background white.
additional_info:
Version: Beta 0.5

Notes From:

V. Alpha 0.1 - This is my first CSS Script, and remains a work-in-progress. Please feel free to lend me a helping hand, or to take this script and make a different version. :D

V. Alpha 0.2 - I learned how to exclude subdomains and webpages. As a result, I excluded everything related to profiles (aka Passports) from the theme. This way, all Passports retain the style that each individual "citizen" specified in their Appearance page.

V. Beta 0.5 - Excluding pages didn't work out so well in alpha 0.2, so I decided to go the traditional route and list all the url-prefixes. This is now safe and aesthetically pleasing enough to install.
